ch0246_00_beet/0101_0701_02_10:
If you can promise not to get in my way, I
suppose I wouldn’t mind adventuring with you.
ch0246_00_beet/7101_0701_01_10:
With my skills, it’s only a matter of time until my
name is carved into Pasio’s history.
ch0246_00_beet/7101_0701_02_10:
As long as I have my teamwork with my partner
Pokémon and the moves we’ve worked on...
ch0246_00_beet/7101_0701_03_10: I’ll overtake any opponent in no time.
ch0246_00_beet/7102_0701_01_10:
Just remember, the Trainer isn’t the only one who
faces embarrassment when a battle is lost.
ch0246_00_beet/7102_0701_02_10:
I feel sorry for Pokémon who end up taking part
in low-level battles.
ch0246_00_beet/7103_0701_01_10:
I’ve got a goal, and in order to achieve it, I’ve
been enduring an excruciatingly painful lifestyle.
ch0246_00_beet/7103_0701_02_10: But that’s a conversation for another time.
ch0246_00_beet/7103_0701_03_10:
Here I am about to pour my heart out to you.
I don’t usually lose my cool.
ch0246_00_beet/7104_0701_01_10:
Do you like the color pink? If so, you should
be careful.
ch0246_00_beet/7104_0701_02_10: If that old lady takes a liking to you...
ch0246_00_beet/7104_0701_03_10:
You’ll end up spending your days surrounded by
the color pink, quizzes, and Fairy-type Pokémon.
ch0246_00_beet/7105_0701_01_10:
Your name is brought up wherever I go on
Pasio, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0246_00_beet/7105_0701_02_10:
At some point, I began to recognize it
as something significant to me.
ch0246_00_beet/1701_0701_01_10: This present is for you. Please hold on to it.
ch0246_00_beet/1701_0702_01_10:
It’ll be interesting to see how you use something I
gave you.
ch0246_00_beet/2501_0701_01_10:
Sometimes, I find myself thinking about the
Ballonlea Stadium in Galar.
ch0246_00_beet/2501_0701_02_10:
I wonder if the stadium’s been cleaned and
if the Pokémon are being cared for properly
while I’m gone.
ch0246_00_beet/2501_0701_03_10: *sigh* It’s not like me to worry about these things.
ch0246_00_beet/2501_0702_01_10:
It’s because I met Ms. Opal that my life has
changed so dramatically.
ch0246_00_beet/2501_0702_02_10: Do you have anybody like that?
ch0246_00_beet/2501_0702_03_10: A person so intense they change your life.
ch0246_00_beet/2511_0701_01_10:
I had some frustrating experiences with my 
Gym Challenge back in Galar, but that helped
me realize something...
ch0246_00_beet/2511_0701_02_10:
You should be the one to decide how to live
your life.
ch0246_00_beet/2511_0701_03_10:
Your own dreams and goals should be the ones
you choose yourself. Otherwise, what’s the point?
ch0246_00_beet/2511_0702_01_10:
I will walk this path and reach the pinnacle of
what Fairy types can do.
ch0246_00_beet/2511_0702_02_10: This is my goal. I’ve chosen it with my own will.
ch0246_00_beet/2511_0702_03_10: I hope that you might also have such a goal.
ch0246_00_beet/3001_0701_01_10:
Being so happy and chipper in the morning is part
of your charm, I suppose.
ch0246_00_beet/3003_0701_01_10:
Off for some training, are you? Why not battle
me, then? You might learn a thing or two.
ch0246_00_beet/3005_0701_01_10:
The sun’s gone down already... Time to prepare
for tomorrow and call it a day.
